Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class CardDevelopmentSlot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CardDevelopmentSlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CardDevelopmentSlot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a slot in which a card development may be placed.
See Also:

    • placeCard

      public CardDevelopment placeCard​(CardDevelopment cardToBePlaced) throws FullSlotException, InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException
      Method to place an acquired CardDevelopment on PersonalBoard. The method incapsulates the placement logic, by which a card can be placed only on top of a card of 1 level lower
      Parameters:
      cardToBePlaced - The bought card to be placed on the personal board
      Returns:
      the card that was pushed successfully
      Throws:
      FullSlotException - when the player tries to place a card on a full slot
      InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException - when an illegal placement is made
